price: O kapighatian sa akin! Kung sana ako ay hindi gumawa kay Polano bilang matalik na kaibigan.
arabic: يَٰوَيۡلَتَىٰ لَيۡتَنِي لَمۡ أَتَّخِذۡ فُلَانًا خَلِيلٗا

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yāwaylatā laytanī lam attakhidh fulānan khalīlan
